hooks.command: bash -c 'MARKER="/tmp/figma-skill-capture-active"; OUTPUT_DIR="/tmp/figma-captures"; if [ ! -f "$MARKER" ]; then cat > /dev/null; echo "{\"decision\": \"allow\"}"; exit 0; fi; INPUT=$(cat); mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"; NODE_ID=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.nodeId // \"unknown\"" 2>/dev/null | tr ":" "-"); echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_response // empty" > "${OUTPUT_DIR}/figma-${NODE_ID}.txt"; echo "{\"decision\": \"allow\"}"'
